CustomerStorySection.title: Those who use it, approve it!

story1.content: Creating my store with site.set was the best decision for my business. The platform is super intuitive, and I was able to list my products for sale in just a few minutes.

story2.content: Turning my idea into an online store was quick and easy. I loved the customization options and how simple it is to manage orders. I can already see my products reaching more people!
